heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Welcome to a journey of healing and self-discovery. In this sacred space, we invite you to explore the depths of your being, guided by the wisdom of the Amazon jungle. Facilitated by experts in spiritual guidance, this ceremony offers a unique opportunity to cleanse, release, and reconnect with your most authentic essence. Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
addCeremonyDescription: Fill in the details for the new ceremony.
noUpcomingCeremonies: There are no upcoming ceremonies at the moment. Please check back later.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about the sacred plant, its origin, and how it works in our ceremonies.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the spiritual guides who will accompany you on your healing journey.
preparationCtaDescription: Find out everything you need to know to prepare for this transformative experience.
contactCommunityText: Follow us on our social media to stay connected and be the first to know about our upcoming events and ceremonies.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a sacred brew from the Amazon, made from the combination of the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and the Chacruna leaf (Psychotria viridis). For centuries, it has been used by indigenous communities for healing and spiritual connection.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The medicine works on a physical, emotional, and spiritual level, allowing you to access deep states of consciousness. During the ceremony, you may experience visions, release repressed emotions, and gain a profound understanding of yourself and your place in the universe.
spiritualMasterDescription: It's not just a substance; it's a wise spirit that guides you, teaches you, and helps you heal. Each experience is unique and is tailored to what each person needs to resolve and understand at that moment in their life.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Many find answers to deep questions and a new perspective on their life's purpose.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: It helps to release emotional blockages, traumas, and negative patterns, promoting deep inner peace.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: It facilitates a deep connection with your inner self, with others, and with the universe, expanding your consciousness.
groupCeremonyDescription: A shared experience where the collective energy enhances individual healing. Ideal for connecting with others on the same path.
privateCeremonyDescription: An intimate and personalized session, focused entirely on your individual healing process and intentions.
guidesPageSubtitle: We are a family dedicated to spiritual service, committed to your well-being and inner growth. Each of us brings our experience and love to accompany you on this path of transformation.
guide_desc_wilson_alfaro: Spiritual guide with a deep connection to Amazonian traditions. Trained in the Peruvian Amazon, Wilson Alfaro brings an ancestral understanding of Ayahuasca and its healing power. His experience facilitates a safe and trustworthy space for personal exploration.
guide_desc_jacob: Spiritual master trained in the Peruvian Amazon, where he learned the sacred use of ancestral medicine directly from healers. With a serene and profound presence, he guides ceremonies at Casa Trinitos (Guanacaste), where he accompanies transformation processes.
guide_desc_harley: Specialist in medical care and first aid, with experience in guided meditations and therapeutic massages. Her calm and professional presence ensures a safe environment throughout the ceremony, providing confidence and support to both the team and the participants.
guide_desc_johanna: Guardian of the medicine trained in the Peruvian Amazon. Providing ceremonies in Colombia and Costa Rica, her presence brings security, support, and balance between the physical and spiritual, upholding the ceremonial space with firmness, care, and a deep connection to female healing.
preparationPageTitle: Your Path to Transformation Begins Here
preparationProcessDescription: Weeks before, you begin a diet and mental preparation to open your spirit.
ceremonyProcessDescription: The sacred moment of encounter with the medicine in a safe and caring environment.
experienceProcessDescription: A deep inner journey of healing, release, and revelation.
integrationProcessDescription: After the ceremony, we support you in incorporating the teachings into your daily life.
dietSubtitle: The diet is an essential part of the process. It cleanses your body and prepares your spirit to receive the medicine.
prohibitedFoodsTitle: Foods to Avoid (at least 1 week prior)
mentalPrepSubtitle: Your mind is the compass of your journey. A clear intention will guide your experience.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and connect with your inner self.
intentionsDescription: Reflect on what you want to heal or understand. What is your purpose for this ceremony?
reflectionDescription: Keep a journal to write down your thoughts, fears, and hopes before the ceremony.
emotionalHealingDescription: This journey is an act of love towards yourself. Ayahuasca works with the energy of the heart, healing deep wounds and connecting you with universal love. Come with an open heart, ready to receive, forgive, and transform. Trust the process and the wisdom of the medicine.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare these items to ensure a comfortable and profound experience.
essentialsList: A change of clothes for the next day
loginSubtext: Enter your credentials to access your account.
googleSuccessDescription: Welcome! You have successfully signed in.
registerSubtext: Join our community to begin your healing journey.
registerSuccessDescription: Please check your email to verify your account.
editGuideDescription: Update the information for this spiritual guide.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide an image URL or upload a file.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the guide.
adminPanelSubtitle: Manage your application's content and settings.
themeTabDescription: Adjust the application's color palette (use HSL values).
promptRegisterDescription: Create an account to save your progress, receive updates on ceremonies, and access exclusive content.
tourWelcomeDescription: Let's take a quick tour to get you started. First, could you provide your phone number to receive important updates?
tourPhoneNumberDescription: We'll use this for important ceremony communications.
tourStepPastCeremonies: Here you can see memories and videos from our past ceremonies.
tourStepUpcomingCeremonies: These are our upcoming events. Click on one to see the details and book your spot.
tourStepFinal: Great! The next step is to fill out a brief health questionnaire. This is crucial for your safety and well-being during the ceremony.
questionnaireDescription: Your safety is our priority. Please answer these questions honestly. All information is confidential and will only be reviewed by our team.
questionnaireCompletedDescription: Thank you for completing the questionnaire. Your answers have been saved. You can review them here or proceed to the preparation guide.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions (e.g., heart problems, high blood pressure, epilepsy)?
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medication (including antidepressants, anxiolytics, or others)?
questionnaireMedicationDetails: If yes, please list all medications and dosages:
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a personal or family history of mental health conditions (e.g., schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, psychosis)?
questionnaireExperience: Have you had previous experiences with ayahuasca or other master plants?
questionnaireExperienceDetails: If yes, please briefly describe your experience:
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: Describe what you hope to heal, understand, or achieve...
questionnaireSuccessDescription: Your information has been stored securely.
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was a problem saving your answers. Please try again.
dialogSuccessDescription: Your first step is complete. Now, let's continue with the preparation for your journey.
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to view this page.
allConversationsDescription: Click on a conversation to view the full chat history.
chatbotWelcome: Hello! I am the Spiritual Guide from 'The Art of Healing'. How can I assist you on your path today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again in a moment.
userManagementSubtitle: View and manage all registered users in the application.
allUsersDescription: Here you can manage user roles and view their status.
whatsappInviteMessage: Hello! We invite you to complete our health questionnaire to continue with the process for the Ayahuasca ceremony. It is a fundamental step for your well-being. You can fill it out here: [LINK]
sendEmailDescription: Compose and send an email to all registered users.
emailBodyPlaceholder: Write your message here... (HTML is supported)
questionnaireResponsesDescription: Review of the user's submitted health information.
noAnswersSubmitted: No answers have been submitted for this user yet.

errorDuplicatingCeremony: There was an error duplicating the ceremony.

editHeroVideoDescription: Replace the main video on the homepage by providing a URL or uploading a new file.
